long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ancyradesktop

Your browser is your desktop:
Ancyra is a Web Desktop (sometimes called a Web OS or a Webtop or a cloud computer). It brings the convenience and comfort you know from classical desktop applications into your browser.

MS SQL, Oracle, MySQL:
No additional components are required in the machine. You get a UI with support for remote management, and many more features. Allows you to manage both local and remote database from your machine.

Application Creator:
How is this possible? Quite simply, we figured out how to create complete feature-rich applications without programming! Online Camelion Designer is the quickest way to build database applications for the Web.
